TopicTitle: Got married last week, KSP had no impact on our wedding what so ever....

Articles.Content:
The ceremony and reception went off without a hitch. But as evidenced below, whenever KSP is involved there is always the potential for a misshap.

The last stage of our cake needed moar struts!

Lol, I can't stop laughing (Don't know why. But that little statue...)

By the way, congratulations! Wish you best of luck in your marriage!
You must have a very understanding wife to even put that on the cake. Or has a good sense of humor. Congrats and good luck in the future.
My wife never would have went for that. She really doesn't like Kerbal, only because I don't play League with her that much because of it.

You must have a very understanding wife to even put that on the cake. Or has a good sense of humor. Congrats and good luck in the future.

How do you know she wasn't the one who wanted it there

I love the design of that cake, the square but twisted is not one I'd seen before, very simple but I like it.

Congratulations, Best wishes for many many years of happiness.
Nothing blew up at your wedding right? I mean, uh, Kerbals have a way of blowing up anything.
Jeb approves (but notes that it could use moar boosters)

She picked the topper.

It did eventually fall off, but the staff put it back together with no issues.

The band did blow an amp.
Did you quicksave before saying "I do" so you could try all the other options?

The band did blow an amp.

For Science!!!!
Hahah, nice. Congratz to ya!

She picked the topper.

Heh. That's a pretty awesome cake. Best of wishes to you both!
My fiance is ready to leave me due to ksp. Playing her games is just not as rewarding. Oh well.
More boosters on the bouquet, it's failed to reach orbit and been recovered by one of the brides maids.
Looks like your marriage has arrived in a good orbit. Congratulations!

Did you quicksave before saying "I do" so you could try all the other options?

Lol, I had to show my wife this, she laughed.

To the OP, congrats. Just don't try to put more boosters on space mountain if you honeymoon at Disneyland. Security gets mad.
How much science did you get on the wedding night, and was the mystery goo well received?
I very much like how the cake diminishes in a geometric sequence. Oh, and Congratulations.

Did you quicksave before saying "I do" so you could try all the other options?

Wow, I wish real life had this option.

How much science did you get on the wedding night, and was the mystery goo well received?

right, im messed up in the head (takes school mates ) so this bit "was the mystery goo well received?" made me think of....ah...never mind
Hahaha, I had a really good laugh at all these comments and also your cake, wish you all the best, mate.
Did that cake have buttercream or whipped frosting?
Gratz mate glad to see i'm not the only crazy one out there!

Did that cake have buttercream or whipped frosting?

It was an italian cream cake with buttercream frosting. The other cake (not shown) was a lemon cake with chocolate buttercream frosting. Both were very tastey!

Was mechjeb working correctly?

Jeb: CAKE!!!!!

Mechjeb: ... I hate my job... Delta v: null
